alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 6:25PM EST until December 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions and very heavy lake effect snow will produce life threatening conditions. Storm total snow accumulations of 3 to 4 feet in the most persistent bands. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. Wind chills as cold as 10 to 20 below zero. * WHERE...Jefferson county. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impossible in the lake effect snow band. Areas of blowing snow will produce zero visibility. Very strong winds will cause extensive tree damage and power outages. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Strong winds will cause significant blowing and drifting snow, frequently reducing visibilities to zero. Travel is strongly discouraged.
